mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `STATISTICS_ENERGY_ANALYSIS_P_${buildingIdx}` ( `DATE` char(8) NOT NULL COMMENT '통계일자', `TIME` char(4) NOT NULL COMMENT '통계시간', `PERIOD_TYPE_CD` varchar(15) NOT NULL COMMENT '기간형태 코드', `ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '에너지계통 시퀀스', `ENEG_INDICATOR_IX` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '에너지지표 시퀀스', `ENERGY_SUM` decimal(20,5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00000' COMMENT '에너지 합산값', `ENERGY_AVG` decimal(20,5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00000' COMMENT '에너지 평균값', `EXT_INPUT_FLAG` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N' COMMENT '외부입력 여부', `CREATE_ID` varchar(12) NOT NULL COMMENT '생성ID', `CREATE_DATE` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '생성날짜', `UPDATE_ID` varchar(12) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '변경ID', `UPDATE_DATE` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '변경날짜', PRIMARY KEY (`ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX`,`ENEG_INDICATOR_IX`,`PERIOD_TYPE_CD`,`DATE`,`TIME`), KEY `R_49` (`ENEG_INDICATOR_IX`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='에너지지표 기간통계_#빌딩정보 시퀀스#';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STATISTICS_ENERGY_ANALYSIS_P_${buildingIdx} ( DATE, TIME, PERIOD_TYPE_CD, ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX, ENEG_INDICATOR_IX, ENERGY_SUM, ENERGY_AVG, EXT_INPUT_FLAG, CREATE_ID) SELECT * FROM (SELECT DATE, CONCAT(SUBSTR(TIME,1,2), '00'), 'H', ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX, ENEG_INDICATOR_IX, SUM(ANALY_VALUE) AS ENERGY_SUM, AVG(ANALY_VALUE) AS ENERGY_AVG, 'N', 'SYSTEM' FROM STATISTICS_ENERGY_ANALYSIS_R_${buildingIdx} WHERE DATE = '${date}' AND SUBSTR(TIME,1,2) = SUBSTR('${time}',1,2) GROUP BY ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX, ENEG_INDICATOR_IX) AS NEW ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ENERGY_SUM = NEW.ENERGY_SUM, ENERGY_AVG = NEW.ENERGY_AVG

INSERT INTO STATISTICS_ENERGY_ANALYSIS_P_${buildingIdx} ( DATE, TIME, PERIOD_TYPE_CD, ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX, ENEG_INDICATOR_IX, ENERGY_SUM, ENERGY_AVG, EXT_INPUT_FLAG, CREATE_ID) SELECT * FROM (SELECT DATE, '0000', 'D', ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX, ENEG_INDICATOR_IX, SUM(ENERGY_SUM) AS ENERGY_SUM, AVG(ENERGY_AVG) AS ENERGY_AVG, 'N', 'SYSTEM' FROM STATISTICS_ENERGY_ANALYSIS_P_${buildingIdx} WHERE DATE = '${date}' AND PERIOD_TYPE_CD = 'H' GROUP BY ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX, ENEG_INDICATOR_IX) AS NEW ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ENERGY_SUM = NEW.ENERGY_SUM, ENERGY_AVG = NEW.ENERGY_AVG

INSERT INTO STATISTICS_ENERGY_ANALYSIS_P_${buildingIdx} ( DATE, TIME, PERIOD_TYPE_CD, ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX, ENEG_INDICATOR_IX, ENERGY_SUM, ENERGY_AVG, EXT_INPUT_FLAG, CREATE_ID) SELECT * FROM (SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTR(DATE,1,6),'00'), '0000', 'M', ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX, ENEG_INDICATOR_IX, SUM(ENERGY_SUM) AS ENERGY_SUM, AVG(ENERGY_AVG) AS ENERGY_AVG, 'N', 'SYSTEM' FROM STATISTICS_ENERGY_ANALYSIS_P_${buildingIdx} WHERE SUBSTR(DATE,1,6) = SUBSTR('${date}',1,6) AND PERIOD_TYPE_CD = 'D' GROUP BY ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX, ENEG_INDICATOR_IX) AS NEW ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ENERGY_SUM = NEW.ENERGY_SUM, ENERGY_AVG = NEW.ENERGY_AVG

INSERT INTO STATISTICS_ENERGY_ANALYSIS_P_${buildingIdx} ( DATE, TIME, PERIOD_TYPE_CD, ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX, ENEG_INDICATOR_IX, ENERGY_SUM, ENERGY_AVG, EXT_INPUT_FLAG, CREATE_ID) SELECT * FROM (SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTR(DATE,1,4),'0000'), '0000', 'Y', ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX, ENEG_INDICATOR_IX, SUM(ENERGY_SUM) AS ENERGY_SUM, AVG(ENERGY_AVG) AS ENERGY_AVG, 'N', 'SYSTEM' FROM STATISTICS_ENERGY_ANALYSIS_P_${buildingIdx} WHERE SUBSTR(DATE,1,4) = SUBSTR('$date',1,4) AND PERIOD_TYPE_CD = 'M' GROUP BY ENEG_SYSTEM_MASTER_IX, ENEG_INDICATOR_IX) AS NEW ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ENERGY_SUM = NEW.ENERGY_SUM, ENERGY_AVG = NEW.ENERGY_AVG
